name: WWII: In the Resistance
description:
The year is 1944. As the Allies set foot in Europe, the people of South Holland hope that the war will soon be over. Unfortunately, the presence of German troops only increases. The hunt for resistance fighters is also intensifying. When resistance fighter Karel is arrested, Frank unwillingly takes his place.

MiSSION

You play the role of Frank who, by necessity, rolls into the resistance. In this Point-N-Click war adventure, you help a small group of resistance fighters carry out various missions. Collecting and passing on military intelligence about the Germans is essential to winning the war. But beware! The walls have ears. The enemy has infiltrated the resistance group and is listening in!

Take on the challenge in this 1944 war adventure. You are expected to stay focused and solve many puzzles. Your fellow resistance fighters are counting on you. Pay attention to the subtle hints that are given and return more often to places you have already visited.

WORLD WAR 2 OFFLINE 2D GAME

This lightweight offline game requires no internet connection to play. 

 WWII In the Resistance is based on true events. Inspired by the 2020 film "The Battle of the Scheldt" (The Forgotten Battle).
